content: Link has been copied to the clipboard

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when a link is successfully copied to the clipboard, typically in a button or link copy action. It appears as an alert or notification in UI components such as ExternalLinks and MetadataUrlField, and is used to provide a positive feedback to users after they have copied a link.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Link buferə köçürüldü' is not the most accurate or natural translation of 'Link has been copied to the clipboard'. 'Bufer' is a direct translation of 'buffer' and while understandable, 'keçirildi' is also a somewhat literal rendering of 'copied'.  A more natural translation would use a word like 'məclis' (clipboard) or a more idiomatic expression.
“Presse-papiers” should be “le presse-papiers” for proper grammatical correctness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Le lien a été copié dans le presse-papiers

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'սեղմատախտակին' (slegmatakhtakin) is the genitive case of 'սեղմատախտակ' (slegmatakhtak) and might sound slightly unnatural or overly formal in this context. A more natural and common phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more common phrasing, such as 'բաժանորդագրային ցանկին' (bajanordragrayn tsankin - to the clipboard) or simply 'ցանկին' (tsankin - to the list).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "clipboard" is transliterated directly. While understandable, a more natural Lao equivalent for 'clipboard' would improve readability. The word 'clipboard' is often used directly in Lao as is, but clarifying it might be helpful.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງໄດ້ຖືກສໍາເນົາໄປໃສ່ເຂດບັນທຶກ (or ໃສ່ບ່ອນບັນທຶກໂອນຂໍ້ມູນ)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using the Lao word for 'to' might improve flow.  'ໄປ' is fine but consider alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງໄດ້ຖືກສໍາເນົາໃສ່ເຂດບັນທຶກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'klembord' is an older term for clipboard. The more common and modern Dutch term is 'knipplaats'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link is gekopieerd naar de knipplaats

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "A ligação foi copiada para a área de transferência" is a very literal translation and sounds unnatural in Portuguese. 'Ligação' usually refers to a phone connection. A more natural translation for a link would be 'o link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O link foi copiado para a área de transferência

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Área de trabalho' translates to 'desktop' or 'workspace' and not 'clipboard'. The English phrase 'Link has been copied to the clipboard' refers to the system clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link foi copiado para a área de transferência

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Încărcarea fișierului media eșuată' translates to 'Media file upload failed'. This is not an accurate translation of 'Link has been copied to the clipboard'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The correct translation should convey the action of copying a link to the clipboard. A possible suggestion is: 'Link-ul a fost copiat în clipboard'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සබැඳිය පසුරුපුවරුවට පිටපත් විය' while containing the correct words, doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English sentence. A more natural phrasing would be 'සබැඳිය ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් වෙත පිටපත් කරන ලදි.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සබැඳිය ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් වෙත පිටපත් කරන ලදි

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Линк је копиран на привремену меморију' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Link has been copied to the clipboard.' 'Привремену меморију' translates to 'temporary memory,' which is not the standard term for a clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Линк је копиран у међускладиште (Link copied to the clipboard)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Link je kopiran na privremenu memoriju' is a literal translation of 'Link has been copied to the clipboard'. While technically correct, a more natural and idiomatic translation would be 'Link je kopiran u međumemoriju' or 'Link je prekopiran u privremenu memoriju'. 'Međumemorija' is more commonly used for clipboard.

While technically correct, 'bộ nhớ tạm' (temporary memory) is not the most natural or user-friendly translation for 'clipboard' in this context. 'Clipboard' is commonly understood as 'khay nhớ' in Vietnamese, especially in software and digital contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên kết đã được sao chép vào khay nhớ
